plot: A Jewish teenager from Israel is sent to a summer camp in the United States to learn about tolerance and coexistence with Arabs. As he forms a friendship with an Arab camper, he faces many challenges within himself and his peers.
title: Camp Pacific
plot_es: A Jewish teenager from Israel is sent to a summer camp in the United States to learn about tolerance and coexistence with Arabs. As he forms a friendship with an Arab camper, he faces many challenges within himself and his peers.
plot_en: A Jewish teenager from Israel is sent to a summer camp in the United States to learn about tolerance and coexistence with Arabs. As he forms a friendship with an Arab camper, he faces many challenges within himself and his peers.
